thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 7 of 265
thread.title: Grace

author: Grace
title: Grace
text:
The meals are easy to put together. The food is delicious and the portions a decent size. I love that I don't have to worry what I need to make.
I store my meals in another refrigerator. It's so easy to grab the box and the protein. You can even take it over to a friends house.
Having the meals 3x a week is just the right amount for us. You can cook a few of your own meals or go out to dinner. It gives me flexibility. I think we are actually saving money and throwing away less food.
